title: Quavo & Takeoff join the show
description:
Jalen & Jacoby are joined by none other than Atlanta Legends, Quavo and Takeoff to talk "Only Built for Infinity Links," Atlanta sports, famous hiphop duos, what it's like working with just two in the booth, and much, much more. Plus! Draymond and Jordan Poole's altercation, and LeBron sends a very clear, very frank message to Adam Silver: I want to own the team that comes to Vegas. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
